Description: Lower body sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; wholly glazed; shallow groove on interior near bottom and turn to rim at top; inscription cut across wheel marks on interior
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Wrongly entered as Chian of the sixth century in LGPN 1.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 112 p.56)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 705, no. 635)
Johnston 1978 / Pottery from Naukratis: An Exhibition on the Occasion of the 11th International Congress of Classical Archaeology (no. 16)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1625)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School at Athens
